entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,178001}...Be careful, Master {F843,0}.{F801}I'm detecting a demon ahead.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,178002}It's that demon that was such a pain{F801}for you before.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,178001}...Be careful, Master {F843,0}.{F801}I'm detecting a demon ahead.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,178002}It's that demon that was such a pain{F801}for you before.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,178003}Going to get revenge? Or will you{F801}back out?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,178003}Going to get revenge? Or will you{F801}back out?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,178004}OK, but be careful, and good luck.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,178004}OK, but be careful, and good luck.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Hades' Soil began to shine in your hand...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Hades' Soil began to shine in your hand...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Writing suddenly appeared on the stone{F801}in front of you...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Writing suddenly appeared on the stone{F801}in front of you...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Something is written on the stone...{F801}{F802}"Deadly" "National Defense Deity"{F801}"Medium" "Master"{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Something is written on the stone...{F801}{F802}"Deadly" "National Defense Deity"{F801}"Medium" "Master"{F801}

entry.source: 〉 More writing appeared on the stone...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 More writing appeared on the stone...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 It reads as follows...{F801}{F802}"I am in your care."{F801}
entry.target: 〉 It reads as follows...{F801}{F802}"I am in your care."{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Yaso Magatsuhi is no longer here...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Yaso Magatsuhi is no longer here...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The stone that was once Yaso Magatsuhi{F801}is sitting in front of you...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The stone that was once Yaso Magatsuhi{F801}is sitting in front of you...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A voice emanates from the stone in{F801}front of you...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A voice emanates from the stone in{F801}front of you...{F801}
